name: Safflower Oil
description: Safflower Oil, also known as Carthame Oil, Kardi Oil, Kardai Oil, or Kusuma Oil, is a versatile and healthful cooking oil derived from the seeds of the safflower plant. Known for its mild flavor and high smoke point, safflower oil is a popular choice for a variety of culinary applications.
